descriptionHtml:
Put this .txt file in the skyrim folder C:\\\\\\\\Program Files (x86)\\\\\\\\Steam\\\\\\\\SteamApps\\\\\\\\common\\\\\\\\Skyrim .
play the game and enter the console command `    type \\\\\\\"bat ench\\\\\\\"   without the \\\\\\\" \\\\\\\" and it gives you weapons/armour to disenchant for all enchantments.
author: I2I0T
